RBG Kew, Kew Gardens, Colonial floras, f. 42.

I am directed by Secretary Sir Edward Bulwer Lytton to acknowledge the receipt of your letter
Letter not found. Presumably these letters -see 58.08.18, d. 40, in this folder -are at the PRO in CO files and we may already have noted them
inquiring whether a grant of money could be made for the publication of a Flora of Australia and I am desired to express his regret that the demands for the public service this year are so large, and that the necessity of making every possible curtailment of expenditure is so imperative, that he feels himself precluded from submitting to the Lords Commissioners of the Treasury an application for the proposed object.
